Html:
Hi!

I am wondering on how to get information regarding the Time Domain. What I mean by this is the amplitude values at various points in time (or in other words, the raw data of the signal). Im stuck with this.

Thanks!
You simply want to look at the raw samples. For 16 bit audio, every 2 bytes is a short representing amplitude.

Hi!

Ive done it already thanks to your blog. Seems that there was very lots of useful info you posted there about tutorials for NAudio and now I am more comfortable with working with the streams and reading data.

Thanks a lot!
